General.Name: AmFIRST Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: AmFirst Real Estate Investment Trust invests in real estate and real estate-related assets in Malaysia. As of March 31, 2007, it owned and managed four commercial office buildings, including Bangunan AmBank Group, AmBank Group Leadership Centre, and Menara AmBank, which are located in the Golden Triangle; and Menara Merais, which is located in Petaling Jaya. Am ARA REIT Managers Sdn. Bhd. serves as the manager of AmFirst Real Estate Investment Trust. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
